resilient: able to recover quickly from difficulties
pivot: strategic change in direction while maintaining momentum
optimize: make the most effective use of
stakeholder: person with interest or investment in success
alignment: arrangement in a straight line or proper position
deliverable: tangible or intangible output from a project
milestone: significant stage or event in development
roadmap: strategic plan showing direction and timeline
velocity: speed of project progress and delivery
touchpoint: point of interaction between business and customer
value proposition: promise of value to be delivered
agile: able to move quickly and adapt
sustainability: ability to maintain over long term
implementation: process of putting plan into action
consolidation: combining multiple things into single unit
saturation: point where market is fully supplied
acquisition: process of gaining control of company
merger: combination of two entities into one
liquidity: ease of converting assets to cash
